Package sait.frms.manager

Class FlightManager

java.lang.Object
sait.frms.manager.FlightManager
public class FlightManager
extends java.lang.Object
Used to manage the flight objects. Loads the flights and airports into arrays to store them.
Author:
Ben and Mike

    • findFlights

      public java.util.ArrayList<Flight> findFlights​(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, java.lang.String weekday)
      If user selects a specific day, then search includes a check that the day matches. If any day is selected, and all flight days with matching flights are included
      Parameters:
      from - Where the flight is from.
      to - Where the flight is to.
      weekday - The day of the week the flight is.
      Returns:
      An Array List of flights that match the search

    • populateFlights

      Populates The array list with all of the flights.
      Throws:
